value:
$WmMPID_キュアン,ch06_14_Cuan_M_Normal,Face|$w0|We of the House of Leonster
descend from the crusader Njörun.$k$pHow can I be other than a man who
fights for what is right? I must, no
matter the cost.$k$p

$WmMPID_リーフ,ch07_02_Leaf_M_Normal,Face|$w0|My father fought to bring peace to
Thracia.$k$pEven if I disappear into the chaos of
war as I battle to achieve that aim, I
will die without regret.$k$p

$WmMPID_シルヴィア,ch06_17_Sylvia_F_Normal,Face|$w0|I am an orphan. After being taken in, I
learned to dance. Let me show you.$k$p

$WmMPID_リーン,ch06_13_Lean_F_Normal,Face|$w0|I became a dancer because I thought
it was the only chance I had to meet
my mother...$k$p

$WmMPID_エルトシャン,ch06_01_Eltshan_M_Normal,Face|$w0|Honor demands that you risk your life
for your friends. But it does not ask
you to back an unjust cause.$k$p

$WmMPID_アレス,ch06_10_Aless_M_Normal,Face|$w0|I will not die here. I will bring about
the restoration of our realm. That
dream did not die with my father.$k$p

$WmMPID_シグルド,ch06_04_Siglud_M_Normal,Face|$w0|Seliph, you must know the sorrows of
the people. Always remember that
there is more than one truth...$k$pIf you do not understand that, you
will never find a reason to fight.$k$p

$WmMPID_セリス,ch06_00_Celice_M_Normal,Face|$w0|If I am fated to fight, then it should at
least be a battle worth fighting. To
fight for what is right is my duty.$k$p

$WmMPID_アルヴィス,ch06_09_Alvis_M_Normal,Face|$w0|You have come to face me? I admire
your daring. It is a waste, however.
My hellfire will burn you to ashes.$k$p

$WmMPID_ユリウス,ch06_12_Yurius_M_Normal,Face|$w0|Fools, all of them—even my father!
Use the useful until they are all used
up...then discard them.$k$p
